Effort Estimation: Extended Examples

tidycreel team

2025-08-20

Source: vignettes/effort_examples.Rmd
effort_examples.Rmd

Extended Examples for Effort Estimators

This vignette provides additional examples and edge cases for the effort estimators in tidycreel. It demonstrates grouping, diagnostics, and error handling. For variance, prefer supplying a day-PSU design built with as_day_svydesign().

vignette: >

%

%

%

Example: Missing Grouping Columns 

library(tidycreel)

# Data missing 'location' and 'shift_block'
counts <- tibble(
  date = as.Date(c("2025-08-20", "2025-08-21")),
  time = c("12:00", "14:00"),
  count = c(10, 12),
  interval_minutes = c(60, 60)
)
result <- est_effort.instantaneous(counts)
print(result)

Example: Single Group (SE/CI NA) 

single_group <- tibble(
  date = as.Date("2025-08-20"),
  time = "12:00",
  count = 10,
  interval_minutes = 60
)
result <- est_effort.progressive(single_group, route_minutes_col = "interval_minutes")
print(result)

Example: Multiple Groups (SE/CI calculated) 

multi_group <- tibble(
  date = rep(as.Date("2025-08-20"), 4),
  time = c("08:00", "10:00", "12:00", "14:00"),
  count = c(5, 8, 10, 12),
  interval_minutes = c(30, 30, 30, 30),
  location = c("A", "A", "B", "B")
)
result <- est_effort.aerial(multi_group, minutes_col = "interval_minutes")
print(result)

Example: Error Handling for Missing Columns 

bad_data <- tibble(date = as.Date("2025-08-20"), count = 10)
try(est_effort.progressive(bad_data)) # Should throw an error (missing route_minutes)

Example: Custom Grouping 

custom_group <- tibble(
  date = rep(as.Date("2025-08-20"), 3),
  time = c("09:00", "11:00", "13:00"),
  count = c(15, 18, 20),
  interval_minutes = c(45, 45, 45),
  region = c("North", "South", "South")
)
result <- est_effort.instantaneous(custom_group, by = c("region"))
print(result)

See the main vignette for more details and references.
